plot: Axl is a young writer, is working in his novel call "Jet 7" thanks to his inspiration and lead lady Amelia. She only lives in his mind but he is in love of her. Everything is OK until the day that they must say goodbye.
title: Jet 7
plot_es: Axl is a young writer, is working in his novel call "Jet 7" thanks to his inspiration and lead lady Amelia. She only lives in his mind but he is in love of her. Everything is OK until the day that they must say goodbye.
